>
[Lizardfolk Lore](/Feats.aspx?ID=5634) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Lizardfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=760" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 26 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

You listened carefully to the tales passed down among your community. You gain the trained proficiency rank in [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=49) and either [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=43) or [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=44). If you would automatically become trained in one of those skills (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice.

 You also gain the [Additional Lore](/Feats.aspx?ID=5114) general feat for either [Astrology Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=41) or Lizardfolk Lore.
name: Lizardfolk Lore
